item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 19, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:

25. Karatsuba Matrix Multiplication and Its Efficient Hardware Implementations (132 points | 15 comments)
26. For Delivery Workers in Latin America, Affordable E-Bikes Are a Superpower (77 points | 68 comments)
